was further enhanced due to the thermodynamically favorable process for the activation of CO 2 methanation reaction.Besides, good cycling ability was observed due to the presence of a layered clay structure, which was sustained in multiple cycles without obvious deactivation.This study provides a green clay based noble-metal-free approach to construct a structured composite photocatalyst with a Z-scheme charge carrier and would be beneficial for CO 2 reduction and other solar energy applications.
